title: Adele's tangled relationship history as she moves on from Simon Konecki with Skepta
text:

Adele is the undisputed queen of break up songs, and when she announced her shock divorce earlier this year, we all wondered what tear jerking heartbroken ballads the next album would bring.

The 31-year-old surprised fans when she quickly moved on with UK rapper and fellow Tottenham native Skepta, 37.

Who has Adele previously dated and written number 1 singles about?

Here is a look at her relationship history so far.

(Image: Getty)

"Mr 19" (2006)

Nicknamed "Mr 19", the ex boyfriend who inspired Adele's first album is the only ex whose identity was never revealed.

Adele's devastated songs about the mystery man include Chasing Pavements and First Love, as the pair shared a painful experience of young love in their teens.

Mr 19 is rumoured to be bisexual, and she wrote Daydreamer about falling in love with him, and then dumping him after witnessing him make a pass at one of her male friends - according to Marc Shapiro's biography of the star.

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

According to another biography by Sean Smith, Adele and Mr 19 dated for three months.

When she found out he cheated, she marched into the bar he was in and punched him in the face.

According to Adele, Lily Allen knows who this ex boyfriend is.

Mr 19 has reportedly demanded royalties from Adele for inspiring some of her best work that has sold millions of copies worldwide.

She told The Sun at the time: “For about a week he was calling and was deadly serious about it. Finally, I said ‘Well, you made my life hell, so I lived it and now I deserve it’.”

She added: “He really thought he’d had some input into the creative process by being a p****. I’ll give him the credit – he made me an adult, and put me on the road that I'm travelling.”

Alex Sturrock (2008-2009)

The man who inspired the album 21, who Adele calls "the love of my life" was finally unmasked as photographer Alex Sturrock.

A source told Heat magazine that the pair dated between 2008 and 2009. They added: "It was an intense period for them. They met through mutual friends and hit it off straight away. He shot her a few times and that was just it.

"They spent all their time together - and when they weren't together they would ring each other constantly.

"Adele relied on him a lot, he was her best mate as well as her boyfriend and he was very protective of her. He'd say no-one knew her like he did."

Smith's biography claimed Adele said of the break up: "This time, nobody did anything wrong.

(Image: Hulton Archive)

"We just fell out of love with one another. I had to deal with the devastation of feeling like a failure because I couldn’t make things work."

Just months after their split, Adele found out Alex was already engaged to someone else - inspiring one of her biggest songs, Someone Like You.

She told The Sun: “I expected too much. I was needy, I was jealous even

though I’m not a jealous person.

“I was feeling pretty miserable and pretty lonely. I was on my knees

really.”

While Adele recovered from this heartbreak, her career was becoming stratespheric. She started mixing in celeb circles, where she met her next fling.

Tinie Tempah (2011)

(Image: Getty Images)

Adele was spotted trying to sneak out unnoticed from her dinner date with rapper Tinie Tempah.

The pair were trying to discreetly leave Beverly Hills restaurant Katsyua together. They shared a lot in common - both UK artists hitting the big time across the pond, sharing several Brits and Grammy Awards between them.

After their dinner, the pair headed to an LA night club to dance the night away.

However Tinie later claimed they just had a "great friendship".

Simon Konecki (2012- 2019)

Adele married charity CEO Simon Konecki, 45, in 2016, and they share a six year old son, Angelo.

The pair always remained tight lipped about their relationship, and while it was initially reported that they wre introduced by mutual friend Ed Sheeran , Ed denied that this was true.

They announced their split in April, releasing a statement that said: "Adele and her partner have separated. They are committed to raising their son together lovingly. As always they ask for privacy. There will be no further comment."

Adele and Simon were first pictured together in 2012 in Florida, near to where Simon's family live, and she first publicly called him her husband in 2017 at the Grammy awards.

(Image: Richard Young/REX/Shutterstock)

She told Vanity Fair: "All of my relationships are more important to me than any tour I’ll ever do.

If my relationship with Simon or my relationship with Angelo started to flounder a bit now, I would pull out of my tour."

She called her marriage with Simon: "The most serious relationship I’ve ever been in."

"He’s not threatened by any stage of my life that I’m going for, and that’s an amazing thing," she said.

Simon was a director of EBS and then managed senior brokers at Lehman Brothers bank, which went under in 2008 at the start of the financial crisis.

He was previously married and had been divorced for four years before he dated Adele, something she was forced to speak out about after rumours circulated that Adele had been the third party in his divorce.

Skepta (2019)

(Image: Twitter)

Following the news of her divorce, Adele surprised fans by moving on with fellow Tottenham native, rapper and producer Skepta, 37.

Adele celebrated with Skepta, real name Joseph Junior Adenuga Jr, on his birthday with a Crystal Maze experience two weeks ago.

A source told The Sun: “Adele and Skepta have been there for each other a lot after both their relationships split up.

"They have a close bond and there’s definitely a special connection.

“They’re spending more and more time together. Some of their friends are hoping and predicting they could end up being a great couple one day.”

Their affection goes way back, and in 2016 Skepta told ES Magazine: “Adele texts me all the time and keeps me in check.

"She speaks to me about how things are going.”

They also publicly tweeted their love for one for one another on Twitter the same year, as Adele posted a pic of Skepta with the caption "Tottenham boy" alongside a love heart emoji, while Skepta retweeted it and added "love you" with a rose emoji.

(Image: Getty Images)

Some of Adele's fans are already joking about the album the star will write after Skepta breaks her heart.

One tweeted: "Adele is dating Skepta. Chin up guys. She will drop 3 albums in one year cos her heartbreak go mad."

"Adele is dating Skepta? Yeah we really gonna get some good heartbreak songs now that she's messing with the brothas," added another.

A third wrote: "Imagine the album from her and diss track from him we'll get if Adele and Skepta break up"

However, more hopeful fans predict some new music from the two artists as their relationship blossoms.
description: Adele is the queen of heartbreak hits - but who are the men who inspired the music?
